name: Cloud Hopper
description:
In this game you play as a.. well, I don't know. You jump across floating islands and platforms to collect monsters and return them to the monster capture pad. You don't know why you're doing this but you are.

I lost a lot of data half way through development so the game isn't as good as it could of been but I hope you enjoy it for the 10 minutes you play it for.

Macelroy - Programming

Hayface - Art

ThyLankest - We're not sure
